text: Coleby Jason Lombardo (born September 7, 1978), is an American former child actor. He appeared in many movies and television series. The most popular of them was The Colbys. In that series, he played young Scott Cassidy. He was nominated for a Young Artist Award for that role. ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Coleby Lombardo
